award_title: Excellence in Research:  Decoding the Role of Pt-Substrate Atom Interactions in Hydrogen Evolution Reaction
subject: Efficient Pt catalysts + reproducible workflows
body:
Hi Professor Kumar,

I noticed your NSF work on making platinum-based catalysts more efficient for water splitting. What caught my attention is the computational sideâ€”understanding how atomic structure affects performance sounds like exactly the kind of research that should be reproducible infrastructure.

I'm building Ouro, a platform to publish computational workflows as APIs with a Python SDK so other researchers can directly use your methods instead of just citing your paper.

Worth exploring together?

Best,
